meanings.sent1: She is a loquacious storyteller, always sharing tales with anyone who will listen.
meanings.sent2: The loquacious parrot entertained the visitors with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent3: The loquacious toddler kept her parents up all night with her endless babbling.
meanings.sent4: Her loquacious nature was like a bubbling brook, never running out of words.
meanings.sent5: The loquacious salesman could sell ice to an Eskimo with his smooth talk.

meanings.sent4: The loquacious river flowed endlessly, just like his stream of words.
